semantic_identifier: [GOLD-136]: Fix Jira/Linear link-out: generate correct deep links and handle missing/mismatched IDs
title: Fix Jira/Linear link-out: generate correct deep links and handle missing/mismatched IDs

sections.text: Jira/Linear link-outs from Issue_Tracker sometimes open broken URLs or point to the wrong item when the downstream issue key/ID format differs by workspace or when mappings are stale. Update link generation to use the configured base URL/workspace slug per integration and validate the stored external ID before rendering. If the ID is missing/invalid, show a clear “Not linked” state with a retry/reconnect action instead of emitting a malformed link.
